links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "Again."
links.text: Again.

links.title: You: "Nothing?"
links.text: Nothing?

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "Nothing, sad brother. No treachery...."
links.text: Nothing, sad brother. No treachery. Just blackout.

links.title: You: "Just lie there, passed out."
links.text: Just lie there, passed out.

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "Well, *almost* nothing. There is th..."
links.text: Well, *almost* nothing. There is the ground below you. That's still there. And the small light that's on -- fluttering -- somewhere in the Basal Ganglia.

links.title: You: "Who's that?"
links.text: Who's that?

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "That's me, blue eyes. That's me."
links.text: That's me, blue eyes. That's me.

links.title: You: "And who was *that*?"
links.text: And who was *that*?

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "Who was what?"
links.text: Who was what?

links.title: Limbic System: "He speaks of the *sickening* longin..."
links.text: He speaks of the *sickening* longing, the unwell emotion. Even in the darkness he's grasping for it, still trying to hold on to the great sorrows slipping in the water -- slimy.

links.title: You: "Yeah, that's the stuff!"
links.text: Yeah, that's the stuff!

links.title: Limbic System: "Here in the Paleo-Mammalian Cortex..."
links.text: Here in the Paleo-Mammalian Cortex we call it -- *the shadow*.

links.title: Limbic System: "Because it's always there."
links.text: Because it's always there.

links.title: Perception (Smell): "Tell him! Tell him!"
links.text: Tell him! Tell him!

links.title: Limbic System: "Ah, yes. And in the olfactory syste..."
links.text: Ah, yes. And in the olfactory system they call it The Apricot Chewing Gum Scented One. It's unhealthy of them to linger on it so. But -- as they say -- what do you do?

links.title: You: "Smelled so nice..."
links.text: Smelled so nice...

links.title: Limbic System: "It didn't smell *nice*. It smelled..."
links.text: It didn't smell *nice*. It smelled like BETRAYAL.

links.title: You: "Smelled like betrayal."
links.text: Smelled like betrayal.

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "Yeah, man. Fuck *everything*. Total..."
links.text: Yeah, man. Fuck *everything*. Total blackout forever.

links.title: You: "Was that the ex-something? The..."
links.text: Was that the ex-something? The...

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "...bloated corpse of the past, resu..."
links.text: ...bloated corpse of the past, resurfacing?

links.title: You: "No, it was beautiful!"
links.text: No, it was beautiful!

links.title: Limbic System: "*Beeaautiful*... Believe me, stupid..."
links.text: *Beeaautiful*... Believe me, stupid ape, its lack of beauty was *not* the problem.

links.title: You: "Yes, that."
links.text: Yes, that.

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "Don't prod at it, it will start mov..."
links.text: Don't prod at it, it will start moving again.

links.title: You: "Where is Voyager Road?"
links.text: Where is Voyager Road?

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "There is no Voyager Road. There are..."
links.text: There is no Voyager Road. There are no roads. No houses. No lights in the windows. It's all on *pause*.

links.title: You: "So my name appears to be... Harry?"
links.text: So my name appears to be... Harry?

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "Your name is *fuck all*."
links.text: Your name is *fuck all*.

links.title: Limbic System: "It certainly ain't Harry."
links.text: It certainly ain't Harry.

links.title: You: "Then what is it?"
links.text: Then what is it?

links.title: Limbic System: "Your name is *Passed Out on the Gro..."
links.text: Your name is *Passed Out on the Ground*. Dragged around by one of the other evil apes. They're taking you somewhere...

links.title: You: "There was something about a bow col..."
links.text: There was something about a bow collector too...

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "Yeah, man, what was that about?"
links.text: Yeah, man, what was that about?

links.title: You: "Enough... just lie there, motionles..."
links.text: Enough... just lie there, motionless.

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "You think they would let you -- unt..."
links.text: You think they would let you -- until you disintegrate into biomolecules? No, someone is breathing on your face now, inspecting your pupils. Stupid idiot.

links.title: You: "I'm not coming back..."
links.text: I'm not coming back...

links.title: Limbic System: "Oh, but you are. They're pouring so..."
links.text: Oh, but you are. They're pouring something on you, *in* you. It's...

links.title: Perception (Taste): "It's DELICIOUS."
links.text: It's DELICIOUS.

links.title: Coupris Kineema: "Glowing lights on a dashboard emerg..."
links.text: Glowing lights on a dashboard emerge out of nothingness.

links.title: You: "...where am I?"
links.text: ...where am I?

links.title: Coupris Kineema: "In the upholstered cabin of Lieuten..."
links.text: In the upholstered cabin of Lieutenant Kitsuragi's motor carriage, seated in the driver's basket. The air is thick with leatherworks and heavy fuel oil. Cold water runs down your chin.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Drink -- water." The lieutenant is..."
links.text: "Drink -- water." The lieutenant is extending a small canister to your mouth.

links.title: You: ""You're back?""
links.text: "You're back?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Mhmh. Now drink." He raises the ca..."
links.text: "Mhmh. Now drink." He raises the canister.

links.title: You: "Drink."
links.text: Drink.

links.title: Coupris Kineema: "The water is cold, silvery  -- the..."
links.text: The water is cold, silvery  -- the stuff of *life itself* as it pours down your parched throat. The pounding in your head recedes, the darkness parts.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Drink." He tilts the canister. "Yo..."
links.text: "Drink." He tilts the canister. "You haven't drunk water in two days. Did you know the human body is not made to survive on alcohol *alone*? You need a secondary form of hydration."

links.title: Rhetoric: "Actually, beer and cider have *load..."
links.text: Actually, beer and cider have *loads* of water in them.

links.title: You: ""You know, in the Franconigerian ce..."
links.text: "You know, in the Franconigerian centuries, the quality of water was so bad it was sometimes more hygienic to drink beer."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But these are not the *Franconiger..."
links.text: "But these are not the *Franconigerian centuries*. We are in the present. It is safe to sometimes drink water here." He hands you the canister.

links.title: You: ""You know, I'm actually more of a *..."
links.text: "You know, I'm actually more of a *magnesium* based lifeform now."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's just a drug addict myth. In..."
links.text: "That's just a drug addict myth. In reality you're still comprised of dihydrogen oxide, which you must replenish to go on living."

links.title: You: "Drink."
links.text: Drink.

links.title: Coupris Kineema: "With greedy gulps, you down half a..."
links.text: With greedy gulps, you down half a litre of cold water. Some of it spills on the driver's seat -- the lieutenant pays no heed to it.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What happened?""
links.text: "What happened?"

links.title: You: ""I should ask you the same.""
links.text: "I should ask you the same."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You were reading your paperwork. T..."
links.text: "You were reading your paperwork. Then you passed out. I carried you to my Kineema... to take you to a hospital. Then you came to."

links.title: You: ""How long was I out?""
links.text: "How long was I out?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Ten minutes maybe.""
links.text: "Ten minutes maybe."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't know. It could have been q..."
links.text: "I don't know. It could have been quite a while." He looks you in the eye, as if inspecting your mental state.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There was a call on the shortwave:..."
links.text: "There was a call on the shortwave: officer passed out in Martinaise." He furrows his brow. "I had a feeling it would be you. I'm glad I got here in time."

links.title: You: ""I came in contact with the burnt o..."
links.text: "I came in contact with the burnt out ruins of the past, lieutenant." (Conclude.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That does sometimes happen." He ha..."
links.text: "That does sometimes happen." He hands you the remains of your ledger.

links.title: Rhetoric: "He replies with such understanding..."
links.text: He replies with such understanding it's as if the burnt out ruins of the past were an occupational hazard -- athlete's foot for cops.

links.title: You: ""I was dehydrated. It won't happen..."
links.text: "I was dehydrated. It won't happen again." (Conclude.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Right." he hands you the waterlogg..."
links.text: "Right." he hands you the waterlogged remains of your ledger.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You dropped this -- are you okay t..."
links.text: "You dropped this -- are you okay to proceed?"

links.title: You: ""Let's solve this case." [Leave.]"
links.text: "Let's solve this case." [Leave.]

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good.""
links.text: "Good."

links.title: Tutorial Agent: "The Ledger of Failure and Hatred is..."
links.text: The Ledger of Failure and Hatred is a special item that can be used both as an INTERACTABLE and a TOOL equipped in your HELD slot for skill bonuses. Find it under the TOOLS tab in your INVENTORY.

links.title: You: "Just nod. [Leave.]"
links.text: Just nod. [Leave.]

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I found this next to you." He paus..."
links.text: "I found this next to you." He pauses. "I'll tag along for the rest of the day if you don't mind. My business is concluded anyway. Are you okay to go?"

links.title: You: ""I... fuck it." Start climbing out..."
links.text: "I... fuck it." Start climbing out of the motor-car. (Conclude.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good." He hands you the waterlogge..."
links.text: "Good." He hands you the waterlogged remains of your ledger.

links.title: You: ""No. I don't wanna.""
links.text: "No. I don't wanna."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There is no use arguing with me. Y..."
links.text: "There is no use arguing with me. You will die if you don't." His voice is pressing: "DRINK."

links.title: Volition: "There really *is* no use arguing wi..."
links.text: There really *is* no use arguing with him. This is him exerting the reserves of authority he usually withholds.

links.title: You: ""No." Push it away."
links.text: "No." Push it away.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Suit yourself." He caps the canist..."
links.text: "Suit yourself." He caps the canister, uninterested in your petulance. With his brow furrowed he asks:

links.title: Volition: "There really *is* no use arguing wi..."
links.text: There really *is* no use arguing with him. This is him exerting the reserves of authority he usually withholds. You can't even try to resist. All you can do is...

links.title: Coupris Kineema: "Glowing lights on a dashboard emerg..."
links.text: Glowing lights on a dashboard emerge out of nothingness.

links.title: You: "What is that? It's cold..."
links.text: What is that? It's cold...

links.title: Limbic System: "Yes, they're *pouring* something on..."
links.text: Yes, they're *pouring* something on you -- something *in* you. And it's...

links.title: You: "No, I was *cool*. I'm cool."
links.text: No, I was *cool*. I'm cool.

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "The cool when you're dead, brother."
links.text: The cool when you're dead, brother.

links.title: You: "Nice and quiet."
links.text: Nice and quiet.

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "Is it? The world is gone, you're no..."
links.text: Is it? The world is gone, you're no longer reacting to outward stimuli. Yet still...

links.title: Limbic System: "...a bitter, caustic sense of loss..."
links.text: ...a bitter, caustic sense of loss remains. Even in the darkness, great sorrows slip in the water -- slimy.
